   Movie's only 84 minutes and there are only some trailers as extras.
   So this is a 1:1 release. Enjoy this mad sci-fi movie from 1975!



&#9608;&#9604; Plot/Synopsis                                                                
&#9608;&#9608;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600;&#9600; 
&#9608;&#9600;                                                                              


   Adormant volcano erupts with the most horrific monsters. Scientists 
   believe they might be creatures from the Ice Age... These ferocious 
   monsters threaten the existence of men and to take over the world. To 
   stand against these creatures, Professor Liu Ying-te, the director of a 
   satellite research station, transforms the brave scientific researcher Ray 
   (Li) into the most powerful and indestructible Super Inframan. This hero 
   possesses the ultra power to strike and defend, together with X-ray vision, 
   solar armor, laser blades, flaming bombs and soul-splitting kicks.
